title-group.article-title: ANALYSIS ON A GENERALIZED ALGORITHM FOR THE STRONG DISCRETE LOGARITHM PROBLEM WITH AUXILIARY INPUTS

abstract.p: We investigate a recently proposed algorithm solving the strong discrete logarithm problem with auxiliary inputs, and show that this algorithm in general is not more efficient than ordinary discrete-logarithm-solving algorithms such as Pollard's rho method, by analyzing a lower bound on the sum of digits of integers.
